item.title: My First Post
item.description: とりあえずブログができました。 test test test test Union-Find algorithm: amortized \(O(\alpha(n))\) time zer0-star $$ \sin(\theta) = \cos\left(\frac{\pi}{2} - \theta\right) $$ $$ \begin{aligned} \sum_{k=0}^\infty \frac{1}{2^k} & = \frac{1}{1 - \frac{1}{2}} \\ & = 2 \end{aligned} $$ import strutils, strformat for s in stdin.readLine().split(): echo fmt"Hello, {s}!" main = do n <- readLn @Int replicateM_ n $ putStrLn "Hello!" \(\vec{a} = (3, 4)\) のとき \(|\vec{a}| = \sqrt{3^2 + 4^2} = 5\)
